IN.IC: je edninska in množinska oblika samostalnika.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
gross
opišemo nekaj nesprejemljivega ali neprijetnega, a zelo velikega po količini ali stopnji.

seg.quote: ...children whose parents are guilty of gross neglect.

sense.def:
Govor ali vedênje, ki je
gross
, kaže pomanjkanje okusa ali je zelo neotesano.

seg.quote: He felt he had said something gross, indecent.

sense.def:
Kar je
gross
, je zelo veliko in grdo.

seg.quote: ...the gross architecture of the Piccadilly frontages.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
gross
opišemo celotni znesek nečesa, potem ko smo mu dodali vse z njim povezane vsote, vendar preden smo kaj odšteli.

seg.quote: His gross income will very likely exceed $900,000 this year.

sense.def:
Izraz
gross
opiše skupno težo nečesa s posodo vred.

seg.quote: ...8,000 merchant ships with a gross tonnage of 20 million.
He bought them by the gross.
